          <title>
            <string language="sl">Baloni v paru</string>
            <string language="en">Pair of balloons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paar Ballone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Paire de ballons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Par dos balões</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accoppiamento degli aerostati</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζευγάρι των μπαλονιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Par de globos</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Dva pisana balona pritegneta vsak pogled.</string>
            <string language="en">Two colored hot air balloons can draw a lot of attention.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">toplozračni balon</string>
            <string language="en">hot air balloon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">košara</string>
            <string language="en">basket</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">balon</string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei farbige Heißluftballone können eine Menge 
Aufmerksamkeit zeichnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux ballons à air chauds colorés peuvent 
dessiner beaucoup d'attention.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois balões de ar quente coloridos podem desenhar
muitos da atenção.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due aerostati di aria calda colorati possono 
dissipare l'attenzione molto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο χρωματισμένα μπαλόνια καυτού αέρα μπορούν να 
επιστήσουν πολλή προσοχή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos globos coloreados del aire caliente pueden 
trazar muchos de atención.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heißluftballon</string>
          </keyword>
